commandDescription.en-US: Makes you enter the waiting room
commandDescription.fr: Te fait entrer dans la salle d'attente
commandDescription.pt-BR: Makes you enter the waiting room

help.en-US: Type $<commandMention> to enter the waiting room
help.fr: Tape $<commandMention> pour entrer dans la salle d'attente
help.pt-BR: Type $<commandMention> to enter the waiting room

reply.en-US: I will process your application once all the verification steps have been completed.
reply.fr: Je traiterai ta candidature une fois que toutes les étapes de vérification auront été remplies.
reply.pt-BR: I will process your application once all the verification steps have been completed.

noPermissionReply.en-US: I do not have the rights to process your application.
noPermissionReply.fr: Je n'ai pas les droits pour traiter ta candidature.
noPermissionReply.pt-BR: I do not have the rights to process your application.
